overview: Photographer Tadashi (Shinsuke Akagi) and design company Yuko (Mariko Junko) who are working part-time are married people who have both built ordinary households. However, as they happen to meet each other, they gradually become more and more attracted to each other.
tagline: Second installation in the "Love Stories" series in which six directors explore the possibilities within different kinds of love.
title: Tryst
